Name: CAI-Corpus
Description: Parallel corpus of 130 children’s stories translated from Modern Standard Arabic to Egyptian (Cairo) dialect.
Paper Title: Optimizing Arabic Dialect Translation for Children’s Literature Using Neural Models
Abstract: This study presents a high-quality parallel corpus of 130 children’s stories translated from Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) to Egyptian (Cairo) dialect using neural machine translation. We fine-tuned the AraT5 model and employed Claude for initial translations, achieving improved semantic similarity and BLEU scores. The resulting corpus is made publicly available to support future research in Arabic dialect translation.
